name: bitsight
label: Bitsight
description: Bitsight is a global cyber risk management leader transforming how companies manage exposure, performance, and risk for themselves and their third parties.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the URL of Bitsight server to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of Bitsight server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: api_token
fields.description: Specify the API token to access the Bitsight server to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the API token to access the Bitsight server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves the detailed list of alerts based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.name: alert_date_gte
parameters.description: Specify the start datetime of the duration from when the data should be fetched.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start datetime of the duration from when the data should be fetched.

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.name: alert_date_lte
parameters.description: Specify the end datetime of the duration till when the data should be fetched.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end datetime of the duration till when the data should be fetched.

parameters.title: Alert Category
parameters.name: alert_type
parameters.description: Specify the alert category to filter the alerts.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the alert category to filter the alerts.

parameters.title: Company GUID
parameters.name: company_guid
parameters.description: Specify the company GUID to filter the alerts.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the company GUID to filter the alerts.

parameters.title: Include Details
parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Include additional alert details.
parameters.tooltip: Include additional alert details.

parameters.title: Folder GUID
parameters.name: folder_guid
parameters.description: Specify the folder GUID to filter the alerts.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the folder GUID to filter the alerts.

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: Specify the severity to filter the alerts.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the severity to filter the alerts.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the limit to fetch the records. Default limit is 100.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the limit to fetch the records. Default limit is 100.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify the offset to fetch the records.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the offset to fetch the records.

operations.title: Get Companies With Exposed Credentials
operations.description: Retrieves the detailed list of companies with exposed credentials in you portfolio based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.name: date_added_gte
parameters.description: Specify the start datetime of the duration from when the data should be fetched.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start datetime of the duration from when the data should be fetched.

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.name: date_added_lte
parameters.description: Specify the end datetime of the duration till when the data should be fetched.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end datetime of the duration till when the data should be fetched.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records to return in the response.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records to return in the response.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify the offset index from where the records should be returned. The index starts from 0.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the offset index from where the records should be returned. The index starts from 0.

operations.title: Get Credentials Leaks Affecting Your Portfolio
operations.description: Retrieves the detailed list of credentials leaks affecting your portfolio based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records to return in the response.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records to return in the response.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify the offset index from where the records should be returned. The index starts from 0.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the offset index from where the records should be returned. The index starts from 0.

operations.title: Get Threat Evidence

parameters.tooltip: Specify the company GUID to filter the records.

parameters.title: Detection Type
parameters.name: detection_type
parameters.description: Specify the detection type to filter the records. You can choose from the following options: Exposure, Mitigation.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the detection type to filter the records. You can choose from the following options: Exposure, Mitigation.

parameters.title: Evidence Certainty
parameters.name: evidence_certainty
parameters.description: Specify the evidence certainty to filter the records. You can choose from the following options: Possible, Likely, Confirmed.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the evidence certainty to filter the records. You can choose from the following options: Possible, Likely, Confirmed.

parameters.title: Exposure Detection
parameters.name: exposure_detection
parameters.description: Specify the exposure detection to filter the records. You can choose from the following options: Currently, Previously.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the exposure detection to filter the records. You can choose from the following options: Currently, Previously.

parameters.title: Force Masked
parameters.name: force_masked
parameters.description: Specify if you want to force mask.
parameters.tooltip: Specify if you want to force mask.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the limit to fetch the records. Default value is 10.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the limit to fetch the records. Default value is 10.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify the offset to fetch the records. Default value is 0.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the offset to fetch the records. Default value is 0.

operations.title: Get Assets
operations.description: Retrieves the detailed list of assets based on the parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Company GUID
parameters.name: company_guid
parameters.description: Specify the company GUID to filter the records.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the company GUID to filter the records.

parameters.title: Asset Name
parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: Specify the asset name to filter the records.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the asset name to filter the records.

parameters.title: Asset Importance
parameters.name: combined_overrides.importance
parameters.description: Filter by asset importance, regardless of whether its importance is calculated or user-assigned.
parameters.tooltip: Filter by asset importance, regardless of whether its importance is calculated or user-assigned.

parameters.title: Expand
parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specify the fields to include the additional information. eg: tag_details
parameters.tooltip: Specify the fields to include the additional information. eg: tag_details

parameters.title: Minimum Asset Count
parameters.name: findings.total_count_gte
parameters.description: Filter assets by more than or equal to a set number of findings.
parameters.tooltip: Filter assets by more than or equal to a set number of findings.

parameters.title: Maximum Asset Count
parameters.name: findings.total_count_lte
parameters.description: Filter assets by less than or equal to a set number of findings.
parameters.tooltip: Filter assets by less than or equal to a set number of findings.

parameters.title: Hosted By
parameters.name: hosted_by_isnull
parameters.description: Filter by assets associated with a hosting provider. Select true to include only the assets with an associated hosting provider, select false to include all assets, regardless of a known hosting provider.
parameters.tooltip: Filter by assets associated with a hosting provider. Select true to include only the assets with an associated hosting provider, select false to include all assets, regardless of a known hosting provider.

parameters.title: Importance Categories
parameters.name: importance_categories
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated value of asset importance to filter the records.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated value of asset importance to filter the records.

parameters.title: Importance Overrides
parameters.name: importance_overrides
parameters.description: Filter assets by those with user-assigned asset importance.
parameters.tooltip: Filter assets by those with user-assigned asset importance.

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip_address
parameters.description: Specify the IP address to filter the records.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP address to filter the records.

parameters.title: Check If IP
parameters.name: is_ip
parameters.description: Filter by asset type. Select true to include only the assets that are IP addresses, select false to include only the assets that are domains.
parameters.tooltip: Filter by asset type. Select true to include only the assets that are IP addresses, select false to include only the assets that are domains.

parameters.title: Origin Subsidiary
parameters.name: origin_subsidiary_isnull
parameters.description: Filter by assets that are attributed to a subsidiary. Select true to include only the assets that are attributed to a subsidiary, select false to include all assets, regardless of an attributed subsidiary.
parameters.tooltip: Filter by assets that are attributed to a subsidiary. Select true to include only the assets that are attributed to a subsidiary, select false to include all assets, regardless of an attributed subsidiary.

parameters.title: Calculated or User-Assigned
parameters.name: overrides_isnull
parameters.description: Filter assets with calculated or user-assigned asset importance. Select true to include only the assets with calculated importance, select false to include only the assets with user-assigned importance.
parameters.tooltip: Filter assets with calculated or user-assigned asset importance. Select true to include only the assets with calculated importance, select false to include only the assets with user-assigned importance.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags_contains
parameters.description: Specify comma separated tags to filter the records.
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated tags to filter the records.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records to return in the response. Default value is 100.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records to return in the response. Default value is 100.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify the offset index from where the records should be returned.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the offset index from where the records should be returned.

parameters.title: Attack Surface Analytics
parameters.name: attack_surface_analytics
parameters.description: Select if you have Attack Surface Analytics. The following parameters are also available if you have Attack Surface Analytics.

Available.title: Countries
Available.name: countries
Available.tooltip: Specify the comma separated value of countries to filter the records.
Available.description: Specify the comma separated value of countries to filter the records.

Available.title: Hosted By
Available.name: hosted_by.guid
Available.tooltip: Specify the comma separated value of company unique identifiers to filter the records.
Available.description: Specify the comma separated value of company unique identifiers to filter the records.

Available.title: Product Name
Available.name: product.name-version
Available.tooltip: Specify the comma separated value of product names and version to filter the records. The value can be specified in this format product:version.
Available.description: Specify the comma separated value of product names and version to filter the records. The value can be specified in this format product:version.

Available.title: Threat GUID
Available.name: threat.guid
Available.tooltip: Specify the comma separated value of vulnerability unique identifiers(vuln_guid) to filter the records.
Available.description: Specify the comma separated value of vulnerability unique identifiers(vuln_guid) to filter the records.

Available.title: Threat Severity Level
Available.name: threat.severity_level
Available.tooltip: Specify the severity level to filter the records.
Available.description: Specify the severity level to filter the records.
